project.name: awe6
project.description: awe6 is game inverted: a scalable, flexible and approachable tool to assist in the rapid development of quality games. For more information visit awe6.org
project.version: Haxe 2.10 compatible release. Includes issue fixes and NME FlashDevelop templates: http://code.google.com/p/awe6/wiki/ReleaseNotes
